attributes.action: Stop the Sun Newspaper entrapping people then publicly humiliating them.
attributes.additional_details: The Sun newspaper used entrapment to record Tulisa set up a cocaine deal with a reporter to publicly humiliate her. They then continued to bully her by tweeting offensive and humiliating tweets from other celebrities. Tulisa Is only 24 and has potentially had her career ruined for sake of a story. Please help stop the Sun from abusing other people for money.

rejection.details: Government cannot interfere with what newspapers do unless it's against the law.
